inn1.comm: short of a driving length and outside the off, Ganguly watches the ball onto bat and plays it down to point
short of a length once more from Anderson, a touch closer to the off stump, left well alone to the keeper
on the off stump this time, still short of a length, Ganguly straddles the pitch and defends back down to the bowler
once again short of a length, this seems to be Anderson's length for the moment, defended watchfully
another one short of a length and outside the off stump, left alone this time, the ball goes through the keeper
It's a maiden over to begin with as Anderson funnels one on the off and Ganguly defends off the back foot
Lewis begins with a full ball down the leg side, glanced at and missed, off the pad to the keeper
full and outside the off this time, glorious off drive but straight to point
fuller and on the pads this time, Tendulkar walks across and dabs the ball to the leg side, still no runs on the board
again fullish and on the off, Tendulkar comes forward to play a stroke, the ball goes off a  thickish inside edge to the leg side
very full and quite straight, Tendulkar drives with a straight bat and finds mid-on for the second maiden over on the trot
short of a length and outside the off stump, Ganguly plays it well to point but just can't beat the fielder at point
just short of a driving length and on the off, Ganguly plays the ball down to off and thinks about setting off for a single but is turned down
short of a length, on the stumps, extra pace and bounce, the ball cuts Ganguly in half and goes through to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off, swinging away as well, left alone to the keeper
short of a length and good pace, the ball climbs steeply as well, Ganguly goes towards the ball to play but sways out of the way well
Ironic cheers from the crowd! India are finally off the mark on the 18th ball they face as Ganguly dabs  one to the off and pinches a single
fullish and outside the off stump, Ganguly feels for that one as it moves away a bit after pitching, through to the keeper
very full and on the off, Ganguly dabs the ball to the leg side with an angled bat, the bowler fields in his follow-through
just back of a length and outside the off, Ganguly slashes through the vacant gully region for a single down to third-man
short of a length and outside the off, pushed to cover with an angled bat, now Tendulkar wants the single and Ganguly refuses it
punched well just wide of cover, the fielder half stops this one, the single is on this time
short of a length and pretty straight, Ganguly pulls down to deep backward fine-leg for a single to end the over
short of a length and outside the off stump, bunted down to the off side for a single
full and going down leg, Tendulkar glances and misses, it's called a wide
short of a length and on the stumps, now Tendulkar drops the ball down to his feet on the on side and a quick single is pinched
fullish and on the off, defended towards cover, no chance of a single there
full and far outside the off stump, driven inside out to cover but once again the ball does not beat the infield
another one outside the off and fairly wide that is timed superbly away but the ball does not beat the infield, India struggling a bit for runs here
short of a good length and outside the off, played down to point
fuller and on the pads, Tendulkar walks right across his stumps and whips the ball through square-leg, the batsmen run the first quite well and a second is possible
shot of the brief morning so far! short of a driving length and outside the off, Tendulkar gets into really good position and drives superbly on the rise through cover ... That is a top shot
And again! This time it's just short of a length and pretty straight, Tendulkar stands tall and drives past mid-on, that is another really good shot
Bang! Now short of a length and outside the off, Tendulkar moves back in a flash and cuts magnificently. That is a really good shot to go with the other two!

Crack! That is a ripper from Tendulkar. Short, too wide and Tendulkar pounces on it in a flash, square-cutting with fierce power. Point has no chance as the ball scorches the turf and races away to the fence. No runs at all till now and suddenly an explosion ...
short of a good length and on the off, played down to the off side
bouncer banged in but it's really short and does not test Ganguly at all. He ducks under it easily as the ball sails through to the keeper
short, on the off and Ganguly pulls but can't get past square-leg
This one's gone ... Ganguly backs away to the leg side, gives himself a bit of room and carves the ball over cover ... that is a very good shot and the bowler can't br faulted for that
And another! Consecutive boundaries for Ganguly now. This time he goes over mid-on and the result is the same

good-length ball on the off, the ball pitches and comes in, Tendulkar drives and misses, rapped on the pad, loud shout for the lbw, turned down, might just have gone over the stumps, good appeal though
down the leg side and Lewis continues to bleed runs. Tendulkar glances the ball away into the gap at fine-leg with the minimum of fuss
worked away through the on side for a couple more
again Tendulkar works the ball just wide of the fielder at mid-on but it'll only be the single this time
short of a good length and on the leg stump, Ganguly walks across and defends to leg
short and a bit of width, Ganguly cuts down to third-man for a single to keep the strike
full and outside the off, flowing drive from Ganguly, the ball goes off the bat nicely but is well stopped by the fielder at short cover

Blasted away! That's a typical Ganguly shot. It's fullish and just wide of the off stump, Ganguly waits on the ball and plays late, driving with an angled bat, placing the ball just where he wanted to. It's a packed off-side field but they have no chance
short of a length and outside the off, slashed away, that's high and wide and keeps third-man interested but bounces just in front of Lewis and then bobs away for another four
chopped down to point
fullish and on the off, worked away to the on side with a straight bat, the fifty comes up and India have picked up the pace after a really slow start
short one banged on the stumps, Tendulkar sees the length early and ducks under the ball, safely through to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off, punched down to cover
fullish and on the off, driven just wide of mid-off with a straight bat
fullish and on the off, coming in with the arm, Tendulkar gets behind the line and defends with bat held close to pad
a tough too straight, slipping down leg, fullish as well, clipped away off the pads for a couple
fullish and just outside the off, Tendulkar waits on that ball and half crouches to get down hard on the ball, square-driving brilliantly. That is a seriously good shot to play off a quick bowler
fuller and on the off, pushed to cover
very full and on the stumps, Collingwood brings himself on, Ganguly digs the ball out
fullish but on the pads, and is dabbed away to the leg side for a single
short of a length and on the off, played down towards point with soft hands
very full and on the off, played down to the leg side, Tendulkar closes the face of the bat on that one
the gentle away swinger. it's fullish and moves late, Tendulkar prods and misses, through to the keeper

Dropped! just short of a good length and on the off, Tendulkar pushes forward in defence, the ball goes off the edge to the keeper but Prior, who is standing up, goes with hard hands and drops the ball
short and a bit of width, cut just pas the man at point
fullish and on the off, defended away to the leg side with a straight bat
short of a good length and on the stumps, Tendulkar walks right across his stumps and places the ball to the leg side, backward of square, for a single
fuller and on the stumps, Ganguly drives down the pitch, Stuart Broad dives in his followthrough and fields
short and slipping down the leg side, Ganguly pulls, the ball bounces down to fine-leg for a boundary
fullish and on the off, eased down to point with an angled bat
full and on the stumps, played back to the off side
a single stroked away to the leg side
full and on the stumps, Ganguly clips the ball to the leg side and takes a single
down the pitch, the ball is dragged down short as well, Tendulkar looks to hit the ball over the leg side, off the inside edge down to short fine-leg
another short one, Ganguly pulls, the ball goes throughto  Prior who catches and appeals loudly. It's turned down ... Was that off bat? Perhaps only thigh pad
down the pitch and a big swing, Tendulkar's going for this, Monty runs back at mid off but can't quite get to the ball
big pull shot this time, the ball goes in the air but easily clears the infield
fullish and on the pads, Tendulkar works it down to fine-leg for a single
short of a good length and on the off, defended towards cover
short of a good length and outside the off, played down towards third-man for a single
fullish and on the stumps, worked to the leg side for a single
full and outside the off, Tendulkar leans forward to push and misses, through to the keeper,Prior whips the bails off and appeals for the lbw but Tendulkar hasn't left his crease
defended carefully to the off side, Collingwood doing a good job here
good length but just a bit too much width. Tendulkar goes back in a flash and punches the ball through cover. That is a fine shot
short of a length and on the pads, flick played and missed, off the thigh pad to short fine-leg
fullish and outside the off, driven on the up and slightly airily to cover
Stuart Broad gets this one wrong. Too far outside the off and it's called a wide
punched to cover
this is a really goodshot. Tendulkar picks the ball up from on the stumps and whips it over the leg side. That takes Tendulkar to his half-century. Yet another one for the little man
Bang! That one is crashed back past the bowler, too straight for mid-on, that is a classic Tendulkar drive on the up
short of a length and outside the off, played down to point
fullish and on the off, punched to point with an angled bat
Ganguly makes room and a has a go, the ball is short of a length and just outside off, Prior takes the ball on the body
fuller and on the off, played down to point
fullish and on the pads, Ganguly works the easy single to the leg side and gives Tendulkar the strike
slower ball, an offcutter, on the stumps, played awkwardly to the leg side
very full, very straight, Tendulkar plays the cheeky lap sweep. There is a fielder at short fine-leg but Tendulkar manages to get the ball away really fine
this is the proper sweep! Lapped away square of the wicket. Again there's no chance for the fielder at short fine-leg. That is a good shot
short of length, outside the off stump, steered to backward point
short of length, on the leg stump line, tries to work it to the on side ,misses and it raps the thigh pad
again on the leg and middle line, slightly short in length, lapped around to short fine leg
he threatens to paddle sweep and Lewis hurls it a tad wide outside off stump and Tendulkar dabs it down to third man
It's Ganguly's turn to play the late cut to third man. With that single, India have reached 100. It has been quite a cracking start
Tendulkar celebrates the landmark with a smashing pull short. It was slightly short in length and Tendulkar rocked back swiftly to pull it over midwicket.
up, up and over! Thunderous drive over long-on. It was full and straight and Ganguly simply cleared the front foot and knifed it through the line.
on the leg stump line, doesn't connect with his glance and the ball rolls away off the pad
full in length, just outside off stump, driven crisply but straight to cover
beaten. He hit the short of length, just outside off stump and Tendulkar pushed at it and was beaten by the extra bounce
Overpitched and Tendulkar smoked it straight down the ground. All along the ground.
full in length, outside off, Tendulkar tries to wrist it away to the on side but makes no contact and the ball strikes the pad
in the zone outside off, steered to backward point
beaten outside off. It was angled across Ganguly who tried to dab it to third man but made no contact
fuller, outside off, Ganguly waits on the ball before tapping it to third man

Gone!That's the wicket England wanted. Tendulkar gone for 71. Jon Lewis finally gets one. It's short of a length, outside the off and Tendulkar tries to open the face of the bat and run the ball down to third man. He only manages an edge and Matt Prior standing up takes a really good catch
short of a length and outside the off, Gambhir leaves his first ball well alone
full and on the off, defended
short of a length and outside the off, Ganguly angles the face of the bat and runs the ball to cover
full and outside the off, Ganguly goes hard at the ball with an angled bat, the ball runs away off a thick inside edge just past the stumps and the keeper. Four more
fullish and outside the off, Ganguly leans into the ball transferring his body weight beautifully and the timing and placement are perfect ... That is a gorgeous shot!
full and on the off once more, driven to cover

short one banged in! Ganguly just manages to fend it off as it's well directed. Gambhir wants a single and comes well down the pitch. He's sent back. Anderson throws but misses the stump at the bowler's end
short and a bit wide, swinging away, left alone to the keeper
full and outside the off, eased to cover, Gambhir not finding the going so easy here
short of a length and on the off, defended towards cover
eased down to third-man for an easy single and that brings up Ganguly's 70th half-century in ODIs!
full and outside the off, defended with an angled bat
just short of a good length and outside the off, Ganguly comes down the track and pulls, off a thick inside edge down towards fine-leg
short of a length and on the off, Gambhir goes back and defends carefully. He's not finding the going easy at all
short of a length and outside the off, Gambhir pushes down to point. Once more no real timing, placement or fluency from Gambhir
short of a length and on the pads, Gambhir clips the ball to the leg side, straight to the fielder
short one fired in, Gambhir thinks about the pull shot but bails out in the end, the ball goes through to the keeper
fuller and on the off, Gambhir can only defend down to point. You have to wonder when Robin Uthappa will get a game for India. Gambhir isn't exactly setting the world alight ...

Biggie! That is a cracking shot. The ball went off the sweet spot and the moment Ganguly hit it you knew it was six. Short and on the stumps. This one just sat up and Ganguly sent it packing. Can't bowl that length at that pace Mr Lewis
fuller and on the stumps, slower ball, played at and missed, off the pad to the off side
slightly shorter, slightly quicker, lots of extra bounce, Ganguly fends to the off side
short of a good length and on the off, defended to cover with an angled bat
full and on the stumps, driven back to mid-on
just short of a length and on the pads, clipped down to fine-leg for a single
very full and on the off, Ganguly gives himself some room and Anderson spears the yorker in, well dug out to cover
short of a driving length and on the off, defended down towards cover with soft hands
short and a bit of width, Gambhir goes back on the crease and slaps the ball away past point for a four. That'll break the shackles a bit
Now over the leg side. Gambhir comes down the pitch and thumps Anderson over mid-on for another boundary
worked away to the on side off the hips
short of a good length and outside the off, a bit of extra pace from Broad, Gambhir plays and misses, through to the keeper
very full and on the off stump, defended back down the pitch
short of a good length and on the off, defended towards cover with soft hands
short of a good length and on the pads, defended to the leg side
short of a good length and outside the off, played down to point, no chance of a run

short of a length and outside the off, nothing wrong with the ball at all, Gambhir opens the face of the bat and dabs the ball down to the third-man boundary. That's a risky shot but one that Gambhir likes
full and fairly flat, on the off, driven to cover
driven back past the bowler who half fields but lets the ball go through
fullish and outside the off, a bit of flight, Gambir nidges to leg and the 150 comes up

Monty strikes! The crowd goes wild at Leeds. Ganguly comes down the pitch, doesn't quite get to the pitch of the ball as it dips late. Ganguly goes through with the stroke, a bit heave over midwicket, anyway, and doesn't hit it well enough. Alastair Cook is the fielder just a few feet inside the ropes and he settles under the catch. That's another big wicket and Monty has struck in just his first over!
tossed up outside the off, Yuvraj Singh watches the ball onto bat and defends carefully
fullish and on the pads, worked down to fine-leg for a single
short of a length, pacy, down leg side, Yuvraj plays and misses, through to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off stump, left well alone to the keeper
too full and on the pads, Yuvraj whips that one away down to fine-leg for a boundary that gets him off the mark
short of a good length and on the stumps, defended back down the pitch
fullish and on the stumps, defended back down the pitch
worked away to the leg side
another one eased away into the on side for a single
short of a good length and outside the off, punched through cover-point for a single
squeezed away just past short third-man for a single
full and flat, played back to Panesar who fields in his followthrough
Dropped! full and on the stumps, Gambhir closes the face of the bat far too early and the ball goes off the leading edge towards short cover. Pietersen dives but can't hold onto the catch
stylishly and powerfully struck through cover for a boundary that takes Yuvraj to 5000 runs in ODIs. That is a good shot!
short of a length and outside the off stump, played and missed, through to the keeper
played down to the leg side, no chance of a single.
tossed up, outside the off, a bit of turn, Yuvraj chops, the ball goes off the edge and Prior catches! But the umpire turns it down ... that is bad luck for England
worked away through the on side
full and on the off, worked away through the leg side
big turn from outside the off, defended towards point
tossed up, on the stumps, defended carefully back down the pitch
full and on the off, Yuvraj defends carefully with the full face of the bat
fullish and straight once more, Yuvraj punches hard back down the ground to long-off for a single
short and a bit of width, cut hard to the man on the fence at point
short of a driving length and outside the off, hit on the up almost one-handed towards long-off
on the stumps, awkwardly dabbed away towards the off
short of a length and on the pads, clipped away to the leg side
short of a length and outside the off, cut past point for a single
worked away through the on side, good running gets the batsmen two
short and too wide, this one sits up and begs to be hit. Yuvraj clobbers the ball backward of point to the boundary
steered towards short third-man for a single
dabbed to the on side for yet another single
full and on the off, driven to long-on
short of a good length and outside the off, played at and missed, through to the keeper
full and on the stumps, thumped down to long-on for a single
short of a length and outside the off, played at and missed, through to the keeper
overpitched and on the off, driven well towards mid-off, should have been just a single but Lewis misfields badly and lets some runs go
played down to fine-leg for a single to end the over
tossed up, Gambhir dances down and goes aerial, over the covers, for four
quicker and flatter, off stump, played to mid-on
tossed up on off stump, Yuvraj punches it to mid-on
tossed up on a length, drawing him forward and he defends
fuller and flatter, Gambhir flicks it from off stump into midwicket for one
tossed up on off stump, again its whipped into the midwicket region
fullish length, angled across Yuvraj, who pushes at it tentatively and the edge runs away to third man
good length, middle and off, played back to Bopara
back of a length, dabbed towards gully for one
fraction width offered and Gambhir opens the face of the bat, steering it wide of gully and down to third man
fuller on off stump, turned to the man at midwicket
nice shot, Yuvraj meets the wide delivery with a firm off-drive down towards mid-off, who's deep
tossed up nicely outside off stump, Yuvraj flirts with it and misses
flatter on off stump, whipped to midwicket, who fumbles the collection
flat delivery on leg stump, easily turned through the gap at square leg
poor ball, full and wide and Yuvraj takes toll, waiting on it and then square-driving wide of deep cover point for four, top shot

gives it a lot of air outside off stump, Yuvraj gets down on bended knee and gives it the kitchen sink, misses, and Prior whips off the bails and asks the question, Aleem Dar refers it and the tv umpire rules he's just got that back leg in
tossed up on a length, he shuffles and plays it to midwicket

played back down the pitch to the bowler, hit very hard at Bopara who fields and takes a hard knock. That's bleeding and will need attention. Half a chance for the catch but you can't fault Bopara for that
Big wide down the leg side
short and easy, that one sits up and belts it through midwicket for four
yet another one down the leg side, again called a wide
short, flat and wide, that should have been put away as well but was not, chopped down to the off side
fullish and on the off, defended awkwardly to point
back of a length and on the pads, worked down to fine-leg, Yuvraj goes for a single but slips and falls, he's holding his knee, this could be trouble
on the pads once more and again worked to the leg side
tossed up and outside the off, sweep played and missed
tossed up and far outside the off, Yuvraj plants his front foot and blasts that through cover, that is a cracking shot
eased through midwicket
quicker, flat and on the off stump, defended to the leg side
back of a length and just slipping down leg, clipped away through square-leg for a single
short of a good length and on the pads, dabbed away to the on side for a single
just short of a length and outside the off, Yuvraj opens the face of the bat and glides the ball down to third-man
short and wide, Gambhir cuts and misses, wide called
again a bit of width outside the off, steered down to third-man for a single
fullish and outside the off, squirted down to third-man with an angled bat for yet another single
full and on the off, Gambhir gets behind the line and hits to point but can't beat the fielder
punched down to long-on for yet another single, the runs are coming, but no big shots in a bit
flat and on the stumps, reasonably fast, smeared to the on side, no chance of a run
again flat and on the stumps, clipped off the hips for a single through the on side
Biggie! Tossed up just a touch more and Yuvraj seizes the opportunity. He comes down the pitch and clatters the ball into the stands at midwicket. That's a powerful hit to get to 50
And another! This time it's the slog sweep. Yuvraj fetches the ball from outside off and creams it one bounce and over the ropes at midwicket
Now Gambhir comes to the party. He jumps down the track, makes a bit of room and slashes the ball over point for a boundary
short one banged in. It's a good ball but Gambhir is upto it, fending the ball away down to fine-leg for a couple that takes him to his half-century
very full, quite quick, outside the off, Gambhir tries to glide the ball to third-man but misses

Gone! Straight after his half-century Gambhir goes. Broad  bangs the ball in short and Gambhir goes for the pull. He's not in good position and is late on the shot. The ball goes high up in the air and the fielder on the fence between midwicket and square-leg takes the catch. That was taken by Andrew Gale, the substitute, who is on the field for Ravi Bopara who injured his thumb trying to field off his own bowling
short one banged in but it's down leg, Yuvraj gets outside the line of the ball nicely and works it away down to fine-leg
very full and on the leg stump, similar to the yorker that cleaned up Yuvraj in the last match. This time he plants his foot and whips the ball down to fine-leg for yet another boundary
full and straight, Dhoni defends carefully to start with
squirted away to the on side, off the edge and then the keeper's gloves
fullish and on the off, the offcutter, defended back down the pitch
fullish and on the off, defended towards cover with an angled bat
very clever bowling. good change of pace, Yuvraj is forced to defend back down the pitch
good-length ball on the off, driven well to mid-off
short of a length and on the off, not much pace, Dhoni punches the ball to cover
just short of a length and on the pads, clipped down to the on side for a single
slower ball, the off-cutter, Dhoni has to watch it carefully and works the ball to the leg side
hammered down the pitch but there's cover. a single to long-on
short one banged in, Yuvraj goes for the pull, he's not  in complete control of that, the ball goes off the top edge but still has enough on it to clear the ropes at square-leg
played back down the wicket a touch awkwardly
thumped down the pitch to long-on
down the leg side, Yuvraj plays and misses, a wide is called and the batsmen cross through as the keeper fumbles
very full and quite straight, driven down to long-on

Another one! Monstrous hit from Yuvraj. He picks the ball up from outside the off and hits it really hard. But that goes high rather than far and into the wind as well. It hangs in the air a touch and  comes down short. James Anderson is the fielder on the midwicket fence and settles under the catch. Important wicket for England but a good innings from Yuvraj
full and straight, worked to the on side for a single
fullish and on the off, driven back to the bowler
fullish and outside the off, held back a touch, good change of pace, played at and missed
flashed hard towards cover but there's plenty of protection and it'll only be a single
short and a bit of width, it's the offcutter, Dravid chops at it and misses
quicker, slightly shorter, down the leg side, swing and a miss from the batsman, the ball races away for extra runs, that's easily called wide
short of a good length and outside the off, played down to point
short of a good length and outside the off, swatted past cover for a single. The big shot can't be far away ...
short ball, Dravid pulls but straight to the man on the fence at square-leg, just a single
short and outside the off, Dravid goes for the big pull and misses. It looks like Dravid's trying a bit too hard here
another agricultural heave from Dravid, again no result as the ball goes off edge onto pad
full and on the off, Dravid makes good contact with this one, driving inside out, but it's just the single
How hard was that hit? Short of a length and Dhoni seemed to have been expecting it. He went right back and pulled ferociously behind square. No chance for any of the fielders
clipped through the on side for a single
fullish and outside the off, Dhoni throws his bat at that, the ball goes over the infield, past point and bounces down towards the boundary where it is cut off
Slashed hard, it's outside the off and there's no-one at slip, four to Dravid and India
Cracking shot! Dravid moves away to the on side and cuts perfectly between point and third-man. That is a quality shot from Dravid and some momentum for India

Beauty! That is a really good shot. Full and on the off, Dravid moves away to leg once more, frees his arms and times the ball over extra-cover. That goes all the way. He didn't look to smash that, just timed it all the way
squeezed through the off and India go past 300

Big end to the over, 19 off it in all, Dhoni picks up a full one from Broad and smashes it straight back down the ground. There's a man at long-off but he has no chance. That was hit with serious brute force
fullish and on the stumps, dug out, Anderson fields and Dhoni is out of his crease backing up ... there's a bit of a collision but all's well in the end
through to the keeper, just outside off, Dravid makes like he's stealing a bye and returns to his crease as Prior throws and hits the stumps, now Dravid sets off and picks up a run
picked up from on the stumps and banished through the leg side, powerful heave through square-leg for a boundary, India are picking up the pace here
short of a length and outside the off, Dhoni has a heave and misses, through to the keeper and wide called

Edged and taken. That was full and outside the off, Dhoni has a hard dash at that, the ball flies off the outside edge and Matt Prior is equal to the task, diving to the right and hanging on to a sharp catch. Dhoni goes and England get some relief
swatted away through square-leg for a single to get off the mark right away

Blasted through the off side. That is another crisp cricket shot from Dravid. Inside out and through cover. The timing, power and placement are perfect and the ball easily beats the sweeper on the off-side fence.
short of a good length and outside the off, Karthik drives and slashes uppishly down to third-man
full and pretty straight, Dravid drives hard but can't beat cover, just the single

Full, outside the off, Karthik has walked very far outside his stumps and tried to paddle the ball along. He misses, Dravid goes through for the bye but is well short of his crease as the throw from Prior hits the stumps. End of a good innings from Dravid
short of a length and outside the off, Zaheer has a swat and misses, through to the keeper
Another big swing and a miss. This time Dinesh Karthik has backed up enough and the batsmen go through for a bye. The ball hits the stumps and they get another run by way of an over throw
full-toss outside the off, Broad strives for the yorker and gets it wrong, Zaheer just uses the pace of the ball, deflecting it past point for a boundary that ends the Indian innings on 324

inn2.comm: very full and on the pads, clipped away off the toes down to square-leg, that could have been costly for India but Cook failed to cash in
very full again and on the stumps, driven back down the pitch to the bowler
fullish and on the off, defended away towards off
another very full ball from Zaheer, he's looking for the yorker, punched to the on side
just short of a good length and outside the off, defended to the off side, quick single taken as Karthik throws from mid-off
back of a length and on the off, Prior walks across and defends to the on side
short of a length and outside the off, not much pace, Cook watches it carefully and leaves it alone to the keeper
full and outside the off stump, driven to cover, all along the ground but not past the man in the circle
just short of a length and outside the off, eased down to mid-off, Gambhir over-runs the ball and allows the single
fullish and outside the off, Prior watches the ball shape away and leaves it alone to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off, cut hard but straight to point
just short of a driving length and outside the off, steered down to third-man for a single
very full and outside the off, Prior tries to drive through mid-on but isn't successful and the ball comes back to the bowler

Dropped! Full and pretty straight, Prior tries to work the ball to the leg side, the ball goes off the edge to Tendulkar at slip. He's moving one way and the ball just seems to swing away in the other direction ... whatever happened, the chance is fluffed
short of a good length and on the stumps, a bit of extra bounce, Prior plays and misses and is struck in the midriff
fullish and outside the off, driven inside out to cover
overpitched and a touch too straight, sliding down the leg side, clipped away to deep backward square-leg for a single

fullish, outside the off, a good line to the left-handed batsman, Cook is forced to play at it, the ball does just enough to take the outside edge, Dhoni goes down to his left and hangs onto the catch. Agarkar is fired up here as he celebrates the fall of the first English wicket

Dropped! short of a good length and outside the off, Bell goes for the cut and gets a thick edge, the ball goes through to Ganguly at second slip at catching height but can't wrap his fingers round the ball. That came quickly at Ganguly and he just couldn't hold onto it
fullish and on the off, punched to cover
short of a good length and outside the off, defended back down the pitch with a straight bat
overpitched and on the pads, flicked away down to deep backward square-leg, Zaheer runs around on the ropes and stops the ball just inside the ropes with boot
fullish and outside the off, punched to cover
full and on the off stump, driven nicely once more but straight to cover
short of a good length and on the stumps, Prior comes across and defends back down the pitch
fullish and on the stumps, Prior comes across and works the ball to the on side
this one is pushed towards cover with soft hands and the batsmen can run through for a single
back of a length, slanting across the bat, Prior shapes to play but is beaten as the ball goes dramatically across the face after pitching, through to the keeper past the outside edge
Crack! Fullish and outside the off, Prior chops hard at the ball and gets four as the ball races away to the fence in front of point
Bouncer banged in, Prior pulls and doesn't get the ball away too convincingly, the ball goes high in the air over mid-off but it doesn't really matter as it's a no-ball
short of a length and outside the off, cut down to third-man for a single
this one comes back in, dabbed away to the leg side for a quick single
fullish and on the off, it's a slower ball, defended carefully to the off and a quick run is pinched

short of a good length and outside the off, Prior plays his favoured square-drive, the ball bounces away quickly in front of point, Ramesh Powar runs around from third-man but he has no chance of cutting that one off and a dive is in vain
short of a good length and on the off, defended carefully
short of a length and on the off, defended back down the pitch
full and fairly straight, defended towards cover
another ball that is full and moves away a lot after pitching, Bell plays and misses, lucky not to edge
short of a good length and on the off, defended watchfully towards point
yet another quick single stolen as the ball is played to the off side
fullish and outside the off, left well alone to the keeper
short of a length and on the off, defended
fullish and outside the off, driven on the up through cover, the timing and placement are good but the fielder will pull the ball up just inside the ropes
fuller and straighter, this is the ball that comes in, Bell goes across and defends well back down the pitch
cut hard but straight to point
fullish and on the off, big booming off drive from Bell, this one simply races away off the bat and there's no chance for the fielder at mid-off
Another! Short one banged in and Bell has no trouble pulling this one away to the fence ... that is a really good shot and not terribly clever bowling
And there's the hat-trick of fours ... fullish and outside the off and Bell lofts beautifully, well wide of the fielder at cover
short of a good length and outside the off, defended away towards the off side for a quick single
just short of a driving length and outside the off, a hint of swing, left well alone to the keeper
short one banged in, outside the off, Bell pulls superbly once more, this time in front of square and the ball races away to the midwicket fence
short of a good length and on the pads, clipped to the on side for a single
fuller and outside the off, played at and missed, this one swings back in a lot but well after it's passed the bat
full and outside the off, driven hard through point, Gambhir does extremely well to run around on the ropes and dive and save the boundary
steered down to third-man for a single to end yet another good over for England
Smack! Full and outside the off, Prior has a thrash at that and perfectly finds the gap in the off side. That is an attractive shot!
short of a good length and outside the off, eased down to third-man for a single
fullish and outside the off stump, driven well but not past the man at mid-off
short of a length and on the off, a bit of pace, defended back down the pitch
very full and slipping down leg, worked down to fine-leg for a couple
short of a good length and outside the off, played down towards point with an angled bat
short of a good length and on the pads, worked to the on side for a quick single
fullish and outside the off, driven hard at, off the outside edge, uppish but safely down to third-man
down the leg side, bit of swing, played and missed, wide called
short of a good length and on the pads, the batsman tries to work the ball to on and misses, off the pad for a leg bye
fullish and on the stumps, worked away to the on side
fullish and down the leg side, flick played and missed, off the pad to the keeper
good length on middle and leg, nudged straight to square leg
good length just around off stump, watchfully played towards point
a touch fuller, outside off stump, and its delicately pushed down to third man
drifts down leg stump, tucked around the corner to Zaheer at short fine leg, who falls over as he fields and has a shy at the stumps
good length, he waits for it and then dabs it down towards third man
good length, straighter one on the stumps, he wants to tip-and-run but is hurried into the shot

edged and there's nobody there! Would you believe it, nobody moved? Bell is forced to stand and poke at a great delivery, angled across him, and the resultant thick edge screams between Dhoni and Ganguly at slip
good length, comes forward and pushes to mid-off
another edge, as Bell drives loosely and the thick edge flies through the vacant second slip region, much to Zaheer's frustration
but thats not edged at all, as Bell leans into a nice half-volley and drives it through the covers in style
good length delivery, pitches outside off and curls in, Bell leaves it be and Dhoni fumbles the collection, allowing the ball to run away to leg
full delivery on the stumps, Prior plays it back down the track to a furious Zaheer, who lets it come and then kicks it away for one, that was needless
good length on leg stump, he swivels it through square leg and thats an easy two for the batsman
fullish delivery, he gets down and drives with too much bottom-hand but cover fails to time his dive and allows more easy runs
full on off stump, Prior flicks across the front pad and works it to midwicket

full and a touch slower, comes in from outside off stump and catches Prior on the front leg as he holds back on the shot, keeping bat behind pad, they all go up in appeal but Aleem Dar shakes his head as Hawk-eye shows it was going down leg

there's the wicket, courtesy a brilliant piece of work from Dhoni! Ganguly pitches full, the ball beats Prior's forward defensive and Dhoni, in an instant, whips off the bails even as Prior completes his shot and falls over, what a stumping! Excellent bowling as well. Two balls came in to the batsman and this one just went away. Some much relief for India as they were at the receiving end of some serious treatment from Prior and Bell
short of a good length and outside the off, left alone to the keeper
fullish and outside the off, a bit of away movement, played at and missed, through to the keeper
short of a good length and outside the off, this time left well alone to the keeper
overpitched, on the off, Bell crunches that back past the bowler, too straight for mid-off and that is four. Another superb shot from the in-form batsman
very full and just outside the off stump, driven to mid-on

Big wicket! fullish, outside the off, angled away from the batsman, Pietersen drives without moving his feet, the ball has done just enough to beat the middle of the bat and take the outside edge. Dhoni does enough behind the stumps, diving across to his right and taking the catch. Pietersen's gone for a duck and India are pumped up. That is a big wicket
short of a good length and on the pads, clipped down to short fine-leg where Zaheer Khan fumbles
fullish and on the off, driven back down the pitch, Ganguly fields
the outswinger again ... fullish and outside the off, left alone to the keeper but that's done a bit

The real big one goes! Ian Bell has taken a real shine to India's bowlers and he's gone here ... Ganguly probes away outside the off and Bell tries to work the ball away down to third-man with an angled bat. There's a thick edge and Dhoni has taken a sharp catch
defended, no run and that's the end of another successful over for India and Ganguly. That was wicket No. 99 in ODIs for Ganguly
quite flat and on the stumps, worked away to the leg side for a single as the rain begins to come down
full, flat and straight, the ball is skidding on, defended back down the pitch
worked away to the leg side, the rain has become really heavy now and the umpires have no choice but to wave the players off the field and get the covers on
full-toss, swatted to cover where Yuvraj fields
and again that's hit hard to Yuvraj who does the fielding
full and on the off, played well down to third-man with an angled bat for a single
down the leg side this time and clipped away behind square on the leg side for runs
fullish and outside the off, placed just wide of the man at point, a couple more as the fielder tidies up on the ropes
quite full and on the pads, flicked through square-leg for a couple of more easy runs as Ramesh Powar fields
dot ball to end the over.
squirted away outside the off for a single to start the over
tossed up a bit and outside the off, driven inside out through cover, pleasing shot
flatter and on the stumps, eased down to cover
slower through the air, on the off, turning away, defended with an angled bat
drifting onto the stumps, clipped away through midwicket for a single
Shot! Tossed up outside the off, too much air on that and too much width, that went badly wrong for Chawla. No problem for Collingwood, though, who crashes the ball through cover
fullish and on the stumps, defended away to the leg side
again quite full and on the stumps, a bit of shape in to the right-handed batsman, played back down the pitch
fullish and quite straight, drifting onto pad, driven through to long-on for a single
just short of a driving length and outside the off, a bit of wobble in the air, defended
full and on the pads, clipped away through square-leg for a single
short of a good length and outside the off, defended away towards point
overpitched and outside the off, driving beautifully through cover, the timing and placement are spot on and the ball races away to the fence
defended back down the pitch
flatter and on the pads, driven down to long on for a single
very full and on the stumps, dug out, no chance of a run there
another tidy delivery, just worked to the on side but no chance of a run
short of a length and outside the off, cut away in front of point, the ball goes towards the boundary and Ramesh Powar runs across and dives, pulling the ball in just before the ropes
full and on the off, pushed to mid-off
good-length ball on the stumps, clipped down to square-leg
full and straight, the attempted yorker, worked to the on side for a comfortable single
full and outside the off stump, eased down towards third-man for a single
fullish and on the off, driven well but straight to the fielder at cover
short of a good length and on the stumps, worked to the on side for a single to end the over
just back of a length and on the stumps, driven down to long-on
very full and very straight, driven back to Tendulkar who fields well
again full, this time a bit too straight, worked down to fine-leg
on the off and very full, driven to mid-on for a single
fullish and just outside the off, Shah backs away to the leg side but Tendulkar isn't fooled and just sends the ball in full and outside the off, it goes through to the keeper
driven down to long-on, end of a tidy first over from Tendulkar
very straight and quite full, really good line and length from Ganguly, defended carefully back down the pitch
fullish and on the off, played to the on side but no chance of a run
short of a good length and outside the off, once again Shah can't get it away, played to point
slightly fuller and on the stumps, driven down to long off for a single
short of a driving length and on the off, Collingwood walks across his stumps and works the ball through the on side
short of a good length and outside the off, played at and missed, through to the keeper
short of a good length and outside the off, driven down to long-on for a single
very full and very straight, played back to the bowler
very full and very straight, played back to the bowler again
full and outside the off, the ball swings away and beats bat, Shah almost overbalances and gets stumped
punched nicely through cover, Dinesh Karthik drives and fields well
inside edge back onto pad. England's batsmen aren't finding the going at all easy against the bowling of Tendulkar and Ganguly
flat and just outside the off, not too much turn, played away to the off side for a single
tossed up and on the off, a touch slower, driven back to the bowler
steered through point for a well-run couple
very full and on the leg stump, eased down to long-on for a single

And once again Powar strikes in his very first over! This one is the drifter that just goes away with the arm. Shah does not pick it at all and plays for the turn. There's a thin edge and once again it's Dhoni who snaps it up. India might be ragged in the field but Dhoni is doing a really good job behind the stumps.
tossed up once more and outside the off, Bopara reaches for it and misses, through to the keeper
short of a driving length and on the off, driven to mid-off
eased through square-leg for a run
fullish and on the stumps, defended to the leg side
back of a length and outside the off, eased to point
single taken down to long-on
short of a length and on the stumps, again just drifting down leg and worked away through square leg
tossed up and on the off, Collingwood comes down the pitch well and drives past cover
flatter and quicker, clipped to the on side but there's a fielder in the circle for that shot
once again a touch straight and worked to leg
Top shot! Tossed up and a touch short, Bopara comes down the pitch swiftly and hits cleanly over mid-on for four
glided past point for a single
fullish and on the stumps, worked to the leg side
fullish and on the off, just a hint of swing, defended back down the pitch
drifting down leg side and worked away for a single, the required rate is now creeping up to 10
Biggie! Collingwood unveils the big slog-sweep and strikes the ball sweetly. The ball sails into the stands over midwicket. That is well struck
And again! Collingwood stands and delivers. It's a repeat of the previous stroke, launched into the stands at midwicket. That's just what England need
played at and missed outside the off
eased to the off side for a single that ends a good over for England
short of a length and outside the off, chopped away past point
flatter and straighter, worked to the leg side for another quick single
tossed up and outside the off, eased to point with an angled bat
tossed up and outside the off, once again the ball is just eased through point and good running gets the batsmen two
down the leg side, the batsman doesn't play a stroke, thinks that should have been called a wide, the umpire reckons it brushed pad
pushed out to the off side
short of a length and on the stumps, Collingwood clubs that through the on-side and brings up his fifty! That is a good knock from Collingwood and he's just beginning to attack here

Bang! That is a smoking good shot. Collingwood gets down on one knee and launches Tendulkar into the stands at midwicket. It's his third hit there and they've all been almost identical. Each time the ball has gone several rows back ...
very full and very straight, dug out to the on side
eased down to long-on, Bopara doing the right thing, just giving Collingwood the strike
defended to the on side
short delivery on leg stump, pulled uneasily past square leg
tossed up full and wide, he makes room and cuts into the covers
tossed up gently, pitches and spins into Collingwood, who waits and tucks it into the square leg region
tossed up, Bopara takes it from off stump and drives back down the ground, Powar dives full length to his right but over the ball, and thats an easy single
tossed up outside off, good loop and dip on that ball, but Collingwood plays it late and watchfully pokes one towards third man

nicely done! Powar tosses it up gently again, holding it back in the air a second late and getting the ball to dip sharply and Bopara, looking to flick it away, closes the bat face and the leading-edge lobs up to the right of the non-striker and Powar, moving behind Collingwood, does very well to take a simple catch, as he would have been unsighted for a brief while
tossed up on a length, Collingwood goes back and punches it back
tossed up on a length, outside off, Broad drives off the back foot to mid-off
fizzed up on middle and leg, Collingwood shuffles and works it to midwicket
tossed up, flicked out to deep backward square for one
well flighted, getting it to pitch and spin past Broad, who doesnt pick the wrong 'un
and Chawla too joins in the fun, tossing one up a touch quicker and fuller on off  stump and Broad can only flick it into the waiting hands of Karthik at midwicket
worked away through point
tossed up and on the stumps, it's the reverse sweep and well played, quite fine but won't go all the way
flat and on the stumps, eased down towards long-on for a single
well flighted and outside the off, Lewis went for the drive but is beaten, through to the keeper
This time Lewis doesn't mess about, picking a ball from outside the off and hitting it to the midwicket fence. Good old fashioned across-the-line smear
full and straight, driven hard but straight to the bowler
And another! Superb slog sweep. Collingwood carts this one into the stands over midwicket. He's peppering that region with big hits
eased down to long-off for a single
short of a good length and outside the off, cut played and missed, through to the keeper

Dropped! Lewis tries the same slog sweep as his captain. The ball goes straight to the fielder on the fence on the leg side. Agarkar comes in, is in bad position and tries to catch the ball above his head. He makes a proper mess of it and the ball goes for four as well. Agarkar's usually very safe in the outfield but on this occasion he makes a royal mess of a catch that should have been taken
worked away through the on side and again the running is really good and the batsmen get two
worked through the on side once more
flatter and outside the off, chopped away through point for a safe single
sweep played and missed, off the pad to the on side
full and straight, played back to the bowler
on the off and quite full, pushed down to long-off for a single that will allow Collingwood to retain the strike
short of a good length and outside the off, played down to third-man
short of a good length and outside the off, played down to third-man for a single
short of a length and on the off, Collingwood pulls, misses and is hit where it really hurts. He stops a moment to catch his breath ...
short of a good length and outside the off, slapped through cover-point for a single
just short of a driving length and on the off, attempted push to on, the ball goes towards mid off off the leading edge, quick single scampered
short of a length and outside the off, flat batted down to mid-off for a single
full and on the stumps, jammed down to square-leg, Gambhir misfields and the batsmen can get back for a couple that lets Collingwood keep the strike
single played down to long-off
tossed up, outside the off, hit high into the midwicket region but it falls well short of Yuvraj on the ropes
low full-toss on the stumps, swatted away to short fine-leg
low full-toss on the stumps, swatted away to short fine-leg
short of a good length and outside the off stump, cut played and missed, through to the keeper
short of a good length and outside the off, played down to third-man
short and a bit of width outside the off, carved down towards third-man for a couple more
very full, the attempted yorker, on the stumps, dug out to the leg side

Another! And Dhoni equals a record for maximum dismissals. Lewis tries one of those across-the-line heaves but can only get a top edge. The ball goes very high in the air and swirls around for an eternity in the strong Leeds winds. Dhoni calls for the catch and appears to get under it. In the end, though, the ball is evading him and he needs to dive to take the catch. He's held on, though, and that's now six dismissals for him in the innings
chopped past point
short of a good length and outside the off, played down to third-man for a single
